Package engine

Class DrawManager

java.lang.Object
engine.DrawManager
public final class DrawManager
extends Object
Manages screen drawing.
Author:
Roberto Izquierdo Amo

  • Method Details

    • setFrame

      public void setFrame​(Frame currentFrame)
      Sets the frame to draw the image on.
      Parameters:
      currentFrame - Frame to draw on.

    • initDrawing

      public void initDrawing​(Screen screen)
      First part of the drawing process. Initialices buffers, draws the background and prepares the images.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw in.

    • completeDrawing

      public void completeDrawing​(Screen screen)
      Draws the completed drawing on screen.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw on.

    • drawEntity

      public void drawEntity​(Entity entity, int positionX, int positionY)
      Draws an entity, using the apropiate image.
      Parameters:
      entity - Entity to be drawn.
      positionX - Coordinates for the left side of the image.
      positionY - Coordinates for the upper side of the image.

    • drawScore

      public void drawScore​(Screen screen, int score)
      Draws current score on screen.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw on.
      score - Current score.

      public void drawHorizontalBox​(Screen screen, int positionY_S, int positionY_E)

      Parameters:

      positionY_S - Start Y coordinate of the line.
      positionY_E - End Y coordinate of the line.

    • drawResults

      public void drawResults​(Screen screen, int score, int score2, int livesRemaining, int livesRemaining2, int shipsDestroyed, int shipsDestroyed2, float accuracy, float accuracy2, boolean isNewRecord, boolean isNewRecord2)
      Draws game results.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw on.
      score - Score obtained.
      livesRemaining - Lives remaining when finished.
      shipsDestroyed - Total ships destroyed.
      accuracy - Total accuracy.
      isNewRecord - If the score is a new high score.

    • drawNameInput

      public void drawNameInput​(Screen screen, char[] name, int nameCharSelected, char[] name2, int nameCharSelected2, Boolean isNewRecord, Boolean isNewRecord2)
      Draws interactive characters for name input.
      Parameters:
      screen - Screen to draw on.
      name - Current name selected.
      nameCharSelected - Current character selected for modification.

      isNewRecord - If the score is a new high score.
